jcr:content.jcr:description: Enable Heatmpas with the Clicktale Connector
jcr:content.jcr:title: Clicktale Connector
jcr:content.descriptionExtended: Clicktale, the enterprise leader in Digital Customer Experience, enables businesses to maximize revenues by optimizing the way people experience the web and mobile.
jcr:content.description: Enable Heatmaps and Session Replay for each page viewed in Adobe Experience Manager. Understand customer behavior before making critical changes to your web site.
